snippet: The New York City Police Department has embarked on a novel approach to deter juvenile robbers, staging interventions in an effort to dissuade those youths most likely to commit crime.
abstract: New York City Police Department launches Juvenile Robbery Intervention Program, effort to deter young robbers by staging interventions with teens most likely to commit crimes; officers keep tabs through repeated home and school visits and by tracking their activities and associates, with idea of isolating high-risk teenagers from peers with whom they commit crimes.
lead_paragraph: The New York City Police Department has embarked on a novel approach to deter juvenile robbers, staging interventions in an effort to dissuade those youths most likely to commit crime.

headline.seo: For Troubled Teenagers in New York City, a New Tack: Forced Outreach
headline.main: To Stem Juvenile Robberies, Police Trail Youths Before the Crime
headline.print_headline: To Stem Juvenile Robberies, Police Trail Youths Before the Crime
